skins.selfIntroduction: Even though I had previously been a training cruiser in charge of raising excellent warriors, I am now standing at the front lines for my country with sword in hand. I pledge my all for my beloved homeland!
skins.acquisition: If you are familiar with the name I have been entrusted with, then you should also understand my noble calling. Jeanne d'Arc of Iris Libre is now under your command.
skins.login: May the port be ever blessed with our Lord's grace.
skins.details: Jeanne d'Arc... While this name imparts a heavy responsibility, I refuse to run away from it. After all, bearing that burden is my duty.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Saint Michael, I beseech you C please tell me what I should do next...
skins.secretaryIdle2: My name, my weapons, and my rigging. All are testament to my conviction.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you're tired, you should rest. Battles should not compose your entire existence.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I-is this what you're into, Commander?

skins.shipDescription: "O chosen hero, I bestow this sword upon you so that you may clear any obstacles in your path..." Commander, how did that sound?
skins.acquisition: "O chosen hero, I bestow this sword upon you so that you may clear any obstacles in your path..." Commander, how did that sound?
skins.login: Commander, shall we get started? I'm all ready.
skins.details: To think that there was such a wonderful movie set at the port... What a surprise.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I know you told me to rest when we take breaks, but... my, how should I put it... I'm really enjoying this work!
skins.secretaryIdle2: There's a dream I have from time to time... I dream of what it would be like to cruise freely about the sea, using only my divine powers to do so, though I as a ship do not deserve such freedom.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Com...mander. Commander. Is something the matter? You've been zoning out while looking at me. By the way, I require your assistance. Would you please come over here?
skins.secretaryTouch: When we wrap up this job, do I want to go to the beach? Yes! I'd love to go to the beach with you!
